content: **this pattern is available as a free ravelry download** a quick and easy crochet pattern for a seahorse work in spiral **skill level ** easy **languages ** english and spanish you can use any yarn and hook i used cotton yarn la abuelita and crochet hook 2 mm follow me on instagram @marsigurumi https //www instagram com/marsigurumi/ made by marsigurumi in 2024 https //www instagram com/p/c39o_amubaz/ img_index=1
